RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 92. Claiming Purse 17500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE NOVEMBER 28. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SONNYISNOTSOFUNNY chased the pace two wide into the stretch, responded under right handed urging in the seven path and was along in time. RIVERBOAT GAMBLER never far back, swung wide, had a mild late rally in the middle of the racetrack and finished clear for second. AMIGO'S AFFAIR broke in front, set the pace until deep stretch then was outfinished. MAKING ME CRAZY failed to menace. UNCLE CHARMING close up into the turn, faded inside.

ENTRY.NAME: Uncle Charming
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, faded inside,

ENTRY.NAME: Riverboat Gambler
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, swung wide, rallied mid track, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Making Me Crazy
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Sonnyisnotsofunny
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2 wide, rallied right handed urging, in time

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Sally Thomas & New Dawn Stable, LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Amigo's Affair
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pace late stretch, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 80. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 28 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GULLANE with the second flight, swung four wide entering the stretch, responded under left hand urging three wide through the final sixteenth of a mile and got up in the final strides. DAWN WEST pressed the pace two wide into the stretch, gained a narrow lead before the furlong marker, set the balance of the pace and just missed hanging on. TONKAWA SPRINGS away alertly, set a pressured pace along the inside into the stretch then was outfinished. CODE VIOLATION vied for the lead along the inside into the far turn, altered course sharply three wide entering the stretch then faded in the final furlong.

ENTRY.NAME: Dawn West
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, led late, just failed,

ENTRY.NAME: Tonkawa Springs
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Code Violation
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, altered course 3 wide 1/4 pole, faded,

ENTRY.NAME: Gullane
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, long drive, 4-3wide, up in final strides,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 90. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE SEPTEMBER 28. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 28 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PAT DADDY stalked the pace into the turn, split rivals two wide past the quarter pole, made the lead under right handed urging, edged clear and prevailed under strong handling. KREWE CHIEF trailed fie wide, closed rapidly outside rivals through the stretch and got up for second. BEACH FRONT never far back, loomed boldly four wide into the stretch then was outfinished in a game effort. KHALFANI offered a mild bid three wide before a half then leveled off. CRAFTY CONQUEST away alertly, set a pressured pace two wide into the stretch and weakened late. UNCAPTURED PULSE pressed the pace along the inside into the stretch, altered course four wide before the eighth pole then faded. SILVER G T O was no threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Krewe Chief
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, closed fast, 5 wide, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Uncaptured Pulse
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, inside, altered course 4path top lane, faded,

ENTRY.NAME: Pat Daddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, split horses 1/4 pole, edged clear late, all out

ENTRY.NAME: Crafty Conquest
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace 2 wide, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Beach Front
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, loomed boldly 4 wide upper stretch, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Silver G T O
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Khalfani
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 3 wide, failed to sustain bid,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 85. Allowance Purse 26400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 28 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowan ces) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHUTUPANDSHAKEIT made the lead soon after the start, set the pace under a firm hold into the stretch then widened the balance of the trip to win as much the best while being ridden out. CALLMEMARTHAJANE trailed early, offered a strong bid four wide into the stretch then was no match for the winner while clear for second. BOUDOIR BURLESQUE had good early speed, offered a bid three wide nearing the quarter pole then was outfinished. YEARS AGO chased the winner along the inside through the turn then faded in the stretch. BOURBONWITHGINGER pressed the early pace two wide and weakened in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Shutupandshakeit
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace, full of run, much the best, ridden out,

ENTRY.NAME: Callmemarthajane
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, middle move, 4 wide, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Boudoir Burlesque
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, loomed boldly 3 wide, turn, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Years Ago
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, inside, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Bourbonwithginger
ENTRY.OWNER: Tooley Jennifer Dolce Vita Farm and Beckett Racing Team
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, weakened lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 28 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RUN AWAY FEVER had speed from the start, responded readily when set down entering the stretch, made the lead under right handed urging near the furlong marker and inched clear late under brisk handling. MIRACLE DRUG (IRE) dueled for the lead two wide into the stretch and finished second best. TALK DIRTY vied for lead the lead three then four wide and finished with good courage. WHAT'S SO FUNNY never far back, found her best stride late in the middle of the racetrack. FREE TO RUN inside, went evenly. HALOFIED stalked the pace four wide into the stretch then faded. AWESOME WONDER battled for the lead along the inside into the stretch then weakened. DREAM TO WIN was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Miracle Drug (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2 wide, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Wonder
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, upper stretch, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Run Away Fever
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside, got through, rallied right handed urging, edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Free to Run
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Talk Dirty
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 3 wide, determinedly

ENTRY.NAME: Halofied
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 4 wide, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Dream to Win
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: What's So Funny
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, best stride late 8path

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 17500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE NOVEMBER 28. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DIVINE MARTHA pressed the pace two wide into the stretch, made the lead near the furlong marker and lasted under mild right handed urging. AFERDITA stalked the pace three wide into the stretch and was steadily cutting into the winners' advantage late. BAREBACK FUN broke in front, set a pressured pace into the stretch and weakened late. BLONDE BY NATURE went evenly. BACKSPLASH trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Bareback Fun
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pressured pace inside, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Backsplash
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Divine Martha
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 2 wide, perfect trip, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Blonde by Nature
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Aferdita
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3 wide, gaining, good effort,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 90. Allowance Purse 26400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 28 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SOROS pressed the pace two wide for five furlongs, assumed command, set the balance of the pace and drew clear under strong handling. BROADWAY SKY with the second flight, surged through deep stretch four wide and got up for second. AGNELLO'S DREAM also with the second flight near the inside, shifted out leaving the far turn, rallied three wide through upper stretch but was outfinished for second. SNOWSCAPE was in tight between horses soon after the start, trailed into the stretch then finished with good courage along the rail. GRAND DEAL failed to menace. WAR NOVEL away alertly, set a pressured pace along the inside for five furlongs, had speed into the stretch then gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Broadway Sky
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, late rally, 4 wide, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Agnello's Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight inside, angled out 1/4 pole, rallied 3w,outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Snowscape
ENTRY.OWNER: Nikkel, Kathryn M. and Robertson, Sanford R.
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight between horses start, finished well inside,

ENTRY.NAME: War Novel
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, 3/8 pole, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: Soros
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, assumed command 3/8 pole, shook clear,

ENTRY.NAME: Grand Deal
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 79. Allowance Purse 36200. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 28 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowa nces).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MIDNIGHT WARSHIP had speed from the start, surged two wide through the turn under a firm hold to make the lead before the quarter pole and drew off under left handed urging. LUCKY STREAK chased the pace nearing the inside, swung out to the eight path entering the stretch and rallied for second. STUNT MAN raced widest of all and had a mile late rally while no threat. ZAKARIA set the pace along the inside into the turn, had speed into the stretch and weakened late. KEEPING SCORE saved ground and was no threat. RUMBLE STRIP RON chased the pace into the turn, steadied while drifting out a bit past the three eighths pole then gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Keeping Score
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Zakaria
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace turn, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Streak
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, swung wide, clear second 8path

ENTRY.NAME: Rumble Strip Ron
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, steadied 3/8 pole, drifted, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Stunt Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: wide trip, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight Warship
ENTRY.OWNER: Mitten Mates LLC and D & D Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, surged 2 wide turn, drew off,
